name: Team Force3d - Brackeys GameJam
description:
Third person  Shooter game.  About joining with other players to increase your Health and Fire power and Killing Enemies.

 __* Includes Speed Run Timer 

__* Made For The Brackeys 2021 game jam

__* Over 5 Different  Guns. Like Sniper, Lazer Gun , Grenade Launcher. e.t.c

__* Multiple Game mode. Campaign & Survival
